name: francescoSforza
ludovicoAriosto
cardDescription: Permanent ability: You can place your Family Members in occupied action spaces.

name: filippoBrunelleschi
cardDescription:
Permanent ability: You don’t have to spend 3 coins when you place 
your Family Members in a Tower that is already occupied.

name: federicoDaMontefeltro
cardDescription:
Once Per Round ability: One of your colored Family Members 
has a value of 6, regardless of its related die.

name: girolamoSavonarola
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Gain 1 Faith Point.

name: giovanniDalleBandeNere
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Receive 1 wood, 1 stone, and 1 coin.

name: sandroBotticelli
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Gain 2 Military Points and 1 Victory Point.

name: michelangeloBuonarroti
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Receive 3 coins.

name: ludovicoIIIGonzaga
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Receive 1 Council Privilege.

name: leonardoDaVinci
picoDellaMirandola
cardDescription:
Permanent ability: When you take Development Cards, you get a discount of 3 coins
 (if the card you are taking has coins in its cost.)

name: sistoIV
cardDescription:
Permanent ability: You gain 5 additional Victory Points when you support 
the Church in a Vatican Report phase.

name: lucreziaBorgia
requirementsDescription: 6 Development Cards of the same type
cardDescription: Permanent ability: Your colored Family Members have a bonus of +2 on their value.

name: sigismondoMalatesta
cardDescription: Permanent ability: Your uncolored Family Member has a bonus of +3 on its value.

name: lorenzoDeMedici
cardDescription:
Permanent ability: Copy the ability of another Leader Card already played by another
 player. Once you decide the ability to copy, it can’t be changed.

name: ludovicoIlMoro
requirementsDescription: 2 Territory Cards, 2 Character Cards, 2 Building Cards, and 2 Venture Cards
cardDescription: Permanent ability: Your colored Family Members has a value of 5, regardless of their related dice.

name: cesareBorgia
requirementsDescription: 3 Building Cards, 12 coins, and 2 Faith Points
cardDescription: Permanent ability: You don’t need to satisfy the Military Points requirement when you take Territory Cards.

name: santaRita
cardDescription:
Permanent ability: Each time you receive wood, stone, coins, or servants as an immediate effect
from Development Cards (not from an action space), you receive the resources twice.

name: cosimoDeMedici
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Receive 3 servants and gain 1 Victory Point.

name: bartolomeoColleoni
cardDescription: Once Per Round ability: Gain 4 Victory Points.
